categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story voice actors
Category:Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope voice actors

nodes.text: David Ankrum (born May 2, 1947) was the voice actor for Wedge Antilles in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope and Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. He overdubbed both Denis Lawson and Colin Higgins throughout the former film.
His father, the veteran character actor Morris Ankrum, appeared in the 1958 film Young and Wild, which also featured Weston Gavin.
